name: Rutabaga Rapture
description:
A humble farmer attempts to harvest rutabagas in the final days before the coming rapture. Use water and toxic gas to grow and defend your crops against pestilence and fire!

Created in 48 hours for GGJ '23.

Controls:   
WASD/Arrow keys - move   
J - spray water
K - spray pesticide
L - pull out/replant rutabagas
